title: John Luke Robertson and his wife Mary Kate of Duck Dynasty share first snaps of baby John Shepherd
text:
They welcomed their first baby on Monday.

And on Wednesday Duck Dynasty's John Luke Robertson and his wife Mary Kate shared the first snaps of their little duckling, John Shepherd, on Instagram.

Mary Kate, 23, revealed their little boy's name in a caption for a cute photo of the newborn in a cozy knitted sweater with his name on the front.

Little duckling: Duck Dynasty star John Luke Robertson's wife Mary Kate shared the first snap of their baby on Instagram on Wednesday, two days after his birth. captioned: 'Hi baby John Shepherd! He decided to surprise us 10 days early on October 14, 2019 and we are in loveeeee'

'Welcome to the world, John Shepherd': Proud papa John Luke, 24, shared this snap of his son

'Hi baby John Shepherd!! He decided to surprise us 10 days early on October 14, 2019 and we are in loveeeee,' she gushed.

On Thursday she posted four more snaps of John Luke wrapping his arms around her as she sat in front of him cradling their son. 'Family of 3!!!' the smiling mom wrote.

John Luke, 24, shared a black and white snap of the baby taken not long after his birth, with a white beanie on his head to keep him warm.

'Welcome to the world, John Shepherd,' he captioned the gorgeous image.

Too cute: On Thursday she posted four more snaps of John Luke wrapping his arms around her as she sat in front of him cradling their son. 'Family of 3!!!' the smiling mom wrote

Eyes tight shut: It looked like little John Shepherd really didn't want to wake up

The very happy couple also took to Instagram 22 weeks ago to reveal that they were expecting as they stood in a field and John Luke held up a sonogram.

'Yep, that's a baby,' he wrote along with a heart emoji.

Meanwhile, Mary Kate and John Luke copied his parents, Korie and Willie Robertson's pose, when his mom was expecting him.

Bumping along: The couple laughed as they copied his parents, Korie and Willie Robertson's pose, when his mom was expecting him 24 years earlier

Tumthing's up: Willie's 'baby bump' was much bigger than Korie's ... and John Luke's

Mary Kate wrote: 'We had so much fun recreating this picture at the beach of John Luke's parents when his mom was pregnant with him (make sure to swipe over)!

'AND little guy is supposed to be an October baby just like JL. (ahh didn't realize till Korie posted but we were both 18 weeks!) #18weeks'

The couple tied the knot in 2015 at his family’s farm in Louisiana.

A&E's Duck Dynasty ran for 11 seasons from 2012 to 2017 and is still on the small screen in reruns.
description: They welcomed their first baby on Monday.. And on Wednesday they took to Instagram to post a snap of the newborn and reveal their little boy's name, adding more snaps  on Thursday.
